kep.reader.csv_data module¶

Read CSV file as stream of rows.

Usage:
gen = CSV_Reader(path).yield_dicts()
class kep.reader.csv_data.CSV_Reader(path: str)[source]¶

Bases: kep.reader.csv_data.StringReader

class kep.reader.csv_data.StringReader(doc: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

yield_dicts()[source]¶

Use iterator to expose file contents.

kep.reader.csv_data.csv_doc_to_dicts(doc)[source]¶
kep.reader.csv_data.csv_file_to_dicts(path)[source]¶
kep.reader.csv_data.doc_to_lists(doc: str) → list[source]¶

Splits string by EOL and tabs, returns list of lists.

kep.reader.csv_data.row_as_dict(row: list) → dict[source]¶

Represents csv row content as a dictionary with ‘head’ and ‘data’ keys: ‘head’ - string, first element in list row (year, table header or comment) ‘data’ - list, next elements in list row,

ususally data elements like [‘15892’, ‘17015’, ‘18543’, ‘19567’]
kep.reader.csv_data.yield_dicts_from_file(path)[source]¶
kep.reader.csv_data.yield_dicts_from_string(doc)[source]¶
kep.reader.csv_data.yield_rows_as_dicts(rows: list) → <built-in function iter>[source]¶

Yield non-empty csv rows as dictionaries.

kep.reader.parsing_definitions module¶

Read parsing specification from yaml file.

Usage:

ParsingDefinition(path)

Class attributes:
.start .end .reader .units .headers .all_labels
class kep.reader.parsing_definitions.Label(varname, unit)¶

Bases: tuple

unit¶

Alias for field number 1

varname¶

Alias for field number 0

class kep.reader.parsing_definitions.ParsingDefinition(path)[source]¶

Bases: kep.reader.parsing_definitions.StringAsYAML

class kep.reader.parsing_definitions.StringAsYAML(yaml_string)[source]¶

Bases: object

Read parsing instruction from string. String format is below:

# scope start line: null # ‘start_line’ end line: null # ‘end_line’ special reader: null # ‘reader_func’ — # ‘units’ section в % к предыдущему периоду: rog период с начала отчетного года в % к соответствующему периоду предыдущего года: ytd в % к соответствующему периоду предыдущего года: yoy — # ‘headers’ section Объем ВВП:

  • GDP
  • bln_rub
Индекс промышленного производства:
  • IND_PROD
static check_parsed_yaml(content)[source]¶

Check data structure after reading yaml.
